alert.note: Alert for Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:59PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Louisa, northeastern Cumberland, Goochland, west central Caroline, northwestern Hanover, northern Powhatan and Fluvanna Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 459 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms near Kents Store, or near Palmyra, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Goochland, Louisa, Mineral, Hadensville, Palmyra, Cartersville, Fork Union, Lake Monticello, Columbia, Gum Spring, Oilville, Ferncliff, Lakeside Village, Kents Store, Troy, Fife, Ladysmith, Bumpass, Montpelier and Boswells Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Louisa; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
